title: Blended Course on Controversial Mathematical Writing for Advanced Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of elementary mathematical concepts and experience in preparing work reports
context.additional_context: Targets mathematics field managers/leaders, in an environment enabling the use of digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze workplace problems using argumentation structures based on at least three mathematical theories
Learners can revise drafts of controversial math reports by incorporating peer feedback with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can accurately use 15 or more academic-level mathematical terms using online collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
